page_content:
Computacenter (UK) Ltd

API Accessible Cloud Storage

API accessible Cloud Storage allows developers to write new applications, leveraging REST/SOAP frameworks, to simply and easily control and consume Storage-as-a-Service directly from their own applications, by simply leveraging a trusted web services API that is compatible with Amazon S3.

Features

  • Natively supports REST or SOAP interfaces
  • Range of services levels
  • Leverage hundreds of existing Amazon S3 compatible applications
  • Solution scales indefinitely on-demand allowing unpredictable capacity growth
  • Metered billing
  • Pan Government Accredited at IL2 & IL3

Benefits

  • Use applications that currently work with Amazon S3
  • Exceptional value: dual site IL3 Storage from 37p per GB
  • Immediately available at all impact levels means no project delays

Pricing

£0.11 per gigabyte per month

  • Excluding VAT
  • Termination costs apply
  • Minimum contract period: Month
  • Trial option available

Service documents
